Ability.Name: Procedural Scan

Description.OldValue: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> over the duration of the channel.

Ability.Name: Kolto Drip

Description.OldValue: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 17.5 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 9 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Name: Electro-Stasis

Description.OldValue: Binds the target in a stasis field for up to 8 seconds. Damage to the target causes this effect to end prematurely. Targets may only be affected by Electro-Stasis once every 30 seconds. Target must not be suffering from periodic damage and have greater than 90% max health.

Ability.Description: Binds the target in a stasis field for up to 10 seconds. Damage to the target causes this effect to end prematurely. Targets may only be affected by Electro-Stasis once every 30 seconds. Target must not be suffering from periodic damage and have greater than 90% max health.

Ability.Name: Preventive Measures
Ability.Description: Places a Kolto-powered shield around the target, preventing a moderate amount of damage for up to 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Go for the Throat
Ability.Description: Your creature leaps at a target with less than 30% health and sinks in, dealing <<1>> internal damage.

Ability.Name: Cutting Swipe
Ability.Description: Your creature cuts the target by dealing <<1>> internal damage over a 10 second duration.

Ability.Name: Kolto Collar Scan

Description.OldValue: Your creature uses its Kolto Collar to heal a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Description: Your creature uses its Kolto Collar to heal a friendly target for <<1>> over the duration of the channel.

Ability.Name: Affectionate Slobber

Description.OldValue: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 17.5 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target. What an incredible smell!

Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 9 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target. What an incredible smell!

Ability.Name: Deafening Roar

Description.OldValue: Your creature unleashes a mighty roar that dazes the target for up to 8 seconds. Damage to the target causes this effect to end prematurely. Targets may only be affected by Deafening Roar once every 30 seconds. Target must not be suffering from periodic damage and have greater than 90% max health.

Ability.Description: Your creature unleashes a mighty roar that dazes the target for up to 10 seconds. Damage to the target causes this effect to end prematurely. Targets may only be affected by Deafening Roar once every 30 seconds. Target must not be suffering from periodic damage and have greater than 90% max health.

Ability.Name: Power Charge
Ability.Description: Your creature lunges at the target and delivers a powerful headbutt, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Exhaustive Shot
Ability.Description: Drains the target by dealing <<1>> weapon damage over a 10 second duration and causing the target to become sundered. Sundered targets have their armor reduced by 20% for 45 seconds.

Description.OldValue: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> over 3 seconds.

Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>> over the duration of the channel.

Ability.Description: Drains the target by dealing <<1>> weapon damage over a 10 second duration and causing the target to become sundered. Sundered targets have their armor reduced by 20% for 45 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Area Scan

Description.OldValue: Bursts an area 8m wide area with a soothing, lingering Kolto cloud. Heals for <<1>> health over 6 seconds.

Ability.Name: Crushing Bite
Ability.Description: Your creature sensing the target's weakend state goes in for a big bite, dealing <<1>> internal damage. Can only be used on targets with less than 30% health.

Ability.Name: Soothing Spittle
Ability.Description: Your creature projects special digestive juices on the target healing for <<1>> and cleansing it of mental and physical effects over 9 seconds. What an incredible smell!

Ability.Name: Hypnotizing Cry

Description.OldValue: Your creature unleashes a mighty cry that dazes the target for up to 8 seconds. Damage to the target causes this effect to end prematurely. Targets may only be affected by Hypnotizing Cry once every 30 seconds. Target must not be suffering from periodic damage and have greater than 90% max health.

Targets may only be affected by Hypnotizing Cry once every 30 seconds. Target must not be suffering from periodic damage and have greater than 90% max health.

Ability.Name: Tongue Pull
Ability.Description: Your three-tongued ginx lets loose its genetically modified tongues and pulls the closest three targets while generating a high amount of threat. Cannot be used on targets in cover or on targets with Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Critical Heart Stab
Ability.Description: Your creature sensing the target's weakend state goes for the heart and stabs at it multiple times, dealing <<1>> internal damage. Can only be used on targets with less than 30% health.

Ability.Description: Your creature cuts the target by dealing <<1>> internal damage over a 10 second duration.

Ability.Name: Ground Smash
Ability.Description: Smash the ground dealing <<1>> internal damage to up to 5 enemies 5m around the user. Generates a moderate amount of threat and reduces incoming damage by 50% for 10 seconds. Does not hit sleeping, lifted, or incapacitated enemies.

Ability.Name: Provoking Scream
Ability.Description: Taunts attacking enemies forcing them to attack your companion and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Threatening Strike
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Force in Balance

Description.OldValue: Deals <<1>> internal damage and redistributes life from affected targets to heal you for 10% of the damage dealt. Strikes up to 8 targets within an 5-meter radius.

Ability.Description: Deals <<1>> internal damage and redistributes life from affected targets to heal you for 10% of the damage dealt. Strikes up to 8 targets within a 5-meter radius.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack

Description.OldValue: Right-click to open this Battler Alliance Pack. This pack contains 4 items, including: 2 from Armor Lootboxes, Mounts or Vehicles, Weapons, Crystals, Stronghold Decorations, or a Creature Companion, 1 companion gift, and 1 scrap material.

Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Revenge Pack. This pack contains 4 items, including: 2 from Armor Lootboxes, Mounts or Vehicles, Weapons, Crystals, Stronghold Decorations, Titles, Pets, Tunings, a Droid Companion, or the Grand Chance Cube, 1 Companion Gift, and 1 Scrap material.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack

Description.OldValue: Right-click to open this Deceptor Alliance Pack. This pack contains 4 items, including: 2 from Armor Lootboxes, Mounts or Vehicles, Weapons, Crystals, Stronghold Decorations, or a Creature Companion, 1 companion gift, and 1 scrap material.

Ability.Description: Right-click to open this GEMINI Pack. This pack contains 4 items, including: 2 from Armor Lootboxes, Mounts or Vehicles, Weapons, Crystals, Stronghold Decorations, Titles, Pets, Tunings, Emotes, a Creature Companion, or the Grand Chance Cube, 1 Companion Gift, and 1 Scrap Material.

Ability.Name: Eternal Empire Recon Walker
Ability.Description:
Activates your Eternal Empire Recon Walker. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Eternal Empire Command Walker
Ability.Description:
Activates your Eternal Empire Command Walker. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Death Field

Description.OldValue: Creates a death field at the target location, dealing <<1>> internal damage and stealing life from affected targets to heal you for 10% of the damage dealt. Strikes up to 8 targets within an 5-meter radius.

Ability.Description: Creates a death field at the target location, dealing <<1>> internal damage and stealing life from affected targets to heal you for 10% of the damage dealt. Strikes up to 8 targets within a 5-meter radius.

Ability.Name: Sabotage Probe

Description.OldValue: Launches a probe droid at the locked target, which will disable their maneuvering thrusters, reduce their evasion by 50%, and deal 280 damage to their hull over 0 seconds.

Ability.Description: Launches a probe droid at the locked target, which will disable their maneuvering thrusters, reduce their evasion by 50%, and deal 280 damage to their hull over 6 seconds.

Ability.Name: Suppressing Fire
Ability.Description: Lays down a stream of suppressing fire hitting all hostiles 4m around the enemy target dealing <<1>> weapon damage to up to 5 targets over 1.5 seconds.

Ability.Name: Deadeye Shot
Ability.Description: Fires a precision shot to a target with less than 30% health, dealing <<1>> weapon damage.

Ability.Name: Electro Dart
Ability.Description: Fires an electro dart stunning the target for 5 seconds.

Ability.Name: Blast
Ability.Description: A powerful shot dealt to a single target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage.

Ability.Name: Exhaustive Shot
Ability.Description: Drains the target by dealing <<1>> weapon damage over a 10 second duration and causing the target to become sundered. Sundered targets have their armor reduced by 20% for 45 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Burst
Ability.Description: Bursts an area 8m wide area with a soothing, lingering Kolto cloud. Heals for <<1>> health over 6 seconds.

Ability.Name: Kolto Shot
Ability.Description: Heals a friendly target for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Kolto Drip
Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 9 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target.

Ability.Name: Electro-Stasis
Ability.Description: Binds the target in a stasis field for up to 10 seconds. Damage to the target causes this effect to end prematurely. Targets may only be affected by Electro-Stasis once every 30 seconds. Target must not be suffering from periodic damage and have greater than 90% max health.

Ability.Name: Preventive Measures
Ability.Description: Places a Kolto-powered shield around the target, preventing a moderate amount of damage for up to 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Anti-Personnel Detonator
Ability.Description: Activates an explosive that deals <<1>> kinetic damage to up to 5 enemies 5m around the user. Generates a moderate amount of threat and reduces incoming damage by 50% for 10 seconds. Does not hit sleeping, lifted, or incapacitated enemies.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple
Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line that fires in a wide cone in front of the companion and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple
Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line that fires in a wide cone in front of the companion and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Provoking Flare
Ability.Description: Fires a flare taunting attacking enemies forcing them to attack your companion and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Powered Charge
Ability.Description: Charges or strikes the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Threatening Focus
Ability.Description: Taunts the target, forcing it to attack the companion for 6 seconds. Also reinforces the companion by placing an absorb shield that absorbs a moderate amount of damage.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple
Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line from your creature's collar that fires in a wide cone in front of the Akk Dog and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple
Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line that fires in a wide cone in front of the companion and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Onslaught
Ability.Description: Your creature viciously claws an enemy hitting all hostiles 4m around the enemy target dealing <<1>> kinetic damage to up to 5 targets.

Ability.Name: Go for the Throat
Ability.Description: Your creature leaps at a target with less than 30% health and sinks in, dealing <<1>> internal damage.

Ability.Name: Headbutt
Ability.Description: Your creature uses its head, stunning the target for 5 seconds.

Ability.Name: Power Swipe
Ability.Description: Your creature delivers a powerful claw swipe, dealing <<1>> internal damage and causes the target to become immobilized.

Ability.Name: Cutting Strike
Ability.Description: Your creature cuts the target by dealing <<1>> internal damage over a 10 second duration.

Ability.Name: Kolto Helm Scan
Ability.Description: Your creature uses its Kolto Helm to heal a friendly target for <<1>> over the duration of the channel.

Ability.Name: Kolto Helm Dart
Ability.Description: Your creature fires a Kolto Dart from its helm, healing the target for <<1>>.

Ability.Name: Affectionate Slobber
Ability.Description: Slowly heals the target for <<1>> over 9 seconds and cleanses physical and mental effects each time it heals the target. What an incredible smell!

Ability.Name: Deafening Roar
Ability.Description: Your creature unleashes a mighty roar that dazes the target for up to 10 seconds. Damage to the target causes this effect to end prematurely. Targets may only be affected by Deafening Roar once every 30 seconds. Target must not be suffering from periodic damage and have greater than 90% max health.

Ability.Name: Kolto Helm Shield
Ability.Description: Your creature uses its helm to place a Kolto-powered shield around the target, preventing a moderate amount of damage for up to 20 seconds.

Ability.Name: Overcharge Equipment
Ability.Description: Your creature's control helm overcharges unleashing an electric discharge dealing <<1>> internal damage to up to 5 enemies 5m around the impact. Generates a moderate amount of threat and reduces incoming damage by 50% for 10 seconds. Does not hit sleeping, lifted, or incapacitated enemies.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple
Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line from your creature's control helm that fires in a wide cone in front of the Bogstalker and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple
Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line from your creature's control helm that fires in a wide cone in front of the Bogstalker and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Unleashed Roar
Ability.Description: Your creature taunts attacking enemies forcing them to attack your creature and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Headbutt
Ability.Description: Your bogstalker delivers a powerful headbutt, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, heals for 25% of damage dealt and generates a moderate amount of threat.

Ability.Name: Alpha Taunt
Ability.Description: Taunts the target, forcing it to attack your creature for 6 seconds. Also reinforces your creature by placing an absorb shield that absorbs a moderate amount of damage.

Ability.Name: Multi-Grapple
Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line that fires in a wide cone in front of the companion and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Tongue Pull
Ability.Description: Your three-tongued ginx lets loose its genetically modified tongues and pulls the closest three targets while generating a high amount of threat. Cannot be used on targets in cover or on targets with Boss Immunity.

Ability.Description: Fires a multi-grapple line from your creature's collar that fires in a wide cone in front of the Akk Dog and pulls the closest three targets and generates a high amount of threat. Only affects targets that are in combat and are not in cover or have Boss Immunity.

Ability.Name: Open Box
Ability.Description: This lootbox contains special Dark vs. Light rewards.

Ability.Name: Poison Spray
Ability.Description: Sprays waves of ionizing energy at targets in a 10-meter cone, dealing <<1>> elemental damage to up to 8 targets and depleting 28 energy cells over the duration.

Ability.Name: Skytrooper Manual Control Device
Ability.Description: Allows you to overwrite and reassign the targeting parameters of a single Skytrooper. Skytrooper must not already be engaged in a targeting or combat program in order to override.

Ability.Name: Prototype EMP Grenade
Ability.Description: Throws an EMP grenade that electrifies the target area, dealing elemental damage over 5 seconds to up to 8 targets within 5 meters and slowing all affected targets by 70%. Stuns weak and standard droids.

Ability.Name: Minor Darklight Experience
Ability.Description: Increases experience gained by 25%

Ability.Name: Darklight Experience
Ability.Description: Increases experience gained by an additional 15% (40% Total)

Ability.Name: Major Darklight Experience
Ability.Description: Increases experience gained by an additional 10% (50% Total)

Ability.Name: Darklight Speed
Ability.Description: Increases out of combat movement speed by 5%

Ability.Name: Mountain Drouk
Ability.Description: Summons a Mountain Drouk which will follow and passively observe you on your adventures.

Ability.Name: Deploy Legacy Cargo Hold Droid
Ability.Description: Deploy a portable legacy cargo hold droid for use by you and your allies.

Ability.Name: Deploy Cargo Hold Droid
Ability.Description: Deploy a portable cargo hold droid for use by you and your allies.

Ability.Name: Registering License...
Ability.Description: Registers your creature handler license.

Ability.Name: Open Box
Ability.Description: This box contains Chestpiece that is only available from the Cartel Market.

Ability.Name: Open Box
Ability.Description: This box contains Belt and Bracers that are only available from the Cartel Market.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Dark vs. Light Pack. This pack contains 4 items, including 1 from Mounts, Armor, Crystal, Tunings, Dyes, Weapons or Stronghold Decorations, 1 companion gift, and 1 Scrap Material and 1 Grand Chance Cube.

Ability.Name: Opening Pack
Ability.Description: Right-click to open this Dark vs. Light Pack. This pack contains 2 items, including 1 Armor Lootbox, Weapon, Mounts or Stronghold Decoration, 1 companion gift, or 1 consumable experience boost.

Ability.Name: Opening...
Ability.Description: Open's a placeable with a medium duration

Ability.Name: Removing...
Ability.Description: Instantly uses the placeable and triggers the "On Use" hook.

Ability.Name: Avalanche Heavy Tank
Ability.Description: Activates the Avalanche Heavy Tank, increasing movement speed based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill and offering extreme protection against being knocked off.

Ability.Name: Avalanche Heavy Tank
Ability.Description: Activates the Avalanche Heavy Tank, increasing movement speed based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill and offering extreme protection against being knocked off.

Ability.Name: Victor's Titan
Ability.Description:
Activates the Victor's Titan, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Victor's Trailblazer
Ability.Description:
Activates the Victor's Trailblazer, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Ragebound Monolith
Ability.Description:
Summons the Ragebound Monolith creature mount. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Eternal Warblazer
Ability.Description:
Activates the Eternal Warblazer, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Zakuulan Drifter
Ability.Description:
Activates the Zakuulan Drifter, increasing movement speed and offering excellent protection against being knocked off. Movement speed increases based on the rank of your Speeder Piloting skill.
Speeder Piloting Rank 1: 90% Speeder Piloting Rank 2: 100% Speeder Piloting Rank 3: 110%

Ability.Name: Inferno
Ability.Description: Used from the falling death exhaustion zone to revive at the nearest med center.

Ability.Name: Mastery Surge
Ability.Description: Healing an ally or performing a damaging attack on an enemy both have a 30% chance to grant 966 of your Mastery Stat for 0 seconds. This effect can only occur once every 20 seconds. It will not trigger inside of PvP areas.
